name: Heroes of Eroticism - Amorous Advances
description:
Return to the world of Heroes of Eroticism
Continue your journey from Heroes of Eroticism – New Beginnings and experience the next 3 episodes of Heroes of Eroticism in this one convenient package. Around 90000 words of excitement, romance and tough choices.

Nearly 2 decades after the pillar of justice – known to the world as the superhero Goldstar – turned his back on everything he once stood for and tried to crown himself Emperor of America, superheroes are once again starting to emerge after having been totally eradicated.

Among those new, young people with powers is Liam – a university student with the strange and unheard of power to copy those of others he grows close to. Struggling to understand and control this power, Liam faces many challenges on the journey to face his destiny.

Meet new friends and enemies at Karsten University – the government mandated university for every young adult that has registered their powers – and discover new secrets and opportunities. Unknown chemicals, strange coincidences and odd behavior from those in positions of power might mean the answers behind the sudden return of superpowers are not as simple as they once appeared.

Not everything in Liam’s life is doom and gloom though. His relationships with the charming Jane and the determined Alison continue to grow. The alluring Iris and free-loving Avery remain part of his life as well and they are even joined by new characters as well.

Characters such as the accident-prone Emma, the serious Willow, the mysterious Erica and the distrusting Hazel. Liam’s new life at Karsten University sure holds a lot of promise.

Answers and new secrets await you both in this continuation of Liam’s story. Step back into the world of lust and superpowers and help uncover the truth.

Features
- Around 90000 words of superpowers, lust and twists and turns
- Combines episodes 4 through 6 into a single package
- Plenty of meaningful choices to make along the way
- Tons and tons of HD images for you to enjoy
- Beautiful music to listen to the entire journey
- The ability to import save files from New Beginnings or Episode 3 – The Renegade to carry over your choices
- The ability to skip importing any save files and start with the default choices if desired
- The ability to import your save file to Episode 7 or the next bundled package of Episode 7 - 9
